Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 3
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.This third cartoon of the set shows Hu Feng with Chiang Kai-shek (Jiang Jieshi 蒋介石), brandishing fountain pen and writing brush, wearing the trousers of counter-revolution.
